com.facebook.buck.parser

Class BuildFileSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.parser.BuildFileSpec

  • public class BuildFileSpec
extends Object
    A specification used by the parser, via TargetNodeSpec, to match build files.
